competitors.name: Synopsys
competitors.notes: Major EDA competitor with approximately 30% market share, developed full end-to-end flow

competitors.name: Siemens EDA (Mentor Graphics)
competitors.notes: Third player with approximately 13% market share, acquired by Siemens in 2016

competitors.name: Ansys
competitors.notes: Primary competitor in engineering simulation software

context: By 2020, Synopsys and Cadence had established a clear duopoly in the EDA industry, each controlling approximately 30% market share. Together with Siemens EDA, these three companies controlled more than 80% of the global EDA market worth $10.8 billion.
